doc.name: printCollate
doc.summary: Reports whether the next print job should automatically interleave multiple copies.

examples.example:
if "collate" is among the items of the printFeatures then
set the printCollate to true
end if

description.p: Use the printCollate property to specify whether to interleave multiple copies of a print job. If a print job has three pages, P1, P2 and P3, with printCollate set to true and printCopies set to 2 the output order will be P1, P2, P3, P1, P2, P3. With printCollate set to false the output will be P1, P1, P2, P2, P3, P3.
The printCollate is either "true" or "false". The default value is determined by the default setting of the current printer.
